item.title: FBI searching Georgia election site for 2020 election records, county officials say
item.description: The FBI has served a search warrant at a Georgia election site seeking records related to the 2020 elections, a spokesperson for Fulton County says.

item.title: Federal Reserve holds interest rates steady
item.description: President Donald Trump has called for significantly lower interest rates.

item.title: WATCH: Man arrested after charging Rep. Omar, spraying her with liquid during town hall
item.description: During a town hall in Minneapolis on Tuesday, a man charged the podium where Rep. Ilhan Omar was giving remarks, appeared to spray a liquid at her, an...

item.title: WATCH: Death toll of protesters killed in Iran's bloody crackdown keeps rising
item.description: A U.N. special rapporteur has suggested more than 20,000 may have been killed.

item.title: Minneapolis live updates: 2 officers involved in Pretti shooting placed on leave
item.description: The Trump administration is grappling with the fallout from the Minneapolis shooting.
